[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Offer” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5)” background_image=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/dh_u2av3ngm-1-scaled.jpg” background_blend=”color” custom_padding=”86px||79px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” filter_brightness=”127%” locked=”off”][et_pb_row custom_margin=”|||” _builder_version=”3.22.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”CTA Section Subtitle” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto|on||on|” text_font_size=”24px” text_letter_spacing=”4px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%”]Exclusive Offer[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”CTA Section Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”||||” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”]

PUERTO RICO

6 DAYS/5 NIGHTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ custom_padding=”38px||29px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”30px|0px|21px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_margin=”-31px|auto||auto||” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.9″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

ITINERARY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”27px|0px|4px|0px|false|false” admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”37px” custom_padding=”0px|||||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 01: ARRIVAL AT SAN JUAN

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”79px” custom_margin=”-22px||47px|||” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

Puerto Rico  officially the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico is an unincorporated territory of the United States, located in the northeastern Caribbean Sea, east of the Dominican Republic and west of both the United States Virgin Islands and the British Virgin Islands. Upon arrival, you will be transferred to your hotel. After check in rest of the day at leisure.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”-1px||2px|||” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald” min_height=”105px”]

DAY 02: SAN JUAN CITY TOUR 

Enjoy a guided tour of Bacardi, the world’s largest rum distillery, where you can sample the goods or buy some liquid souvenirs. Then, visit one of the best-preserved Spanish colonial cities in the world, Old San Juan. The entire city is a National Historic Preservation site that is a must-see on any visit to Puerto Rico.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”43px” custom_margin=”28px||28px||true|” custom_padding=”12px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 03: SAN JUAN (LEISURE DAY)

Enjoy your day on own at the beach, walking around this great city and the best part the happy and welcoming people.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”5px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 04: VIEQUES ISLAND

Today after breakfasts, check out from hotel and transfer to Fajardo for your ferry to Vieques Island. Ferry ticket must be purchased on own as it can’t be pre-purchased by a third party. Transfer to Vieques Island, and transfer to hotel. Check-in at the hotel, and rest of the day at leisure.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald” min_height=”66px” custom_margin=”4px||47px|||”]

DAY 05: VIEQUES ISLAND

Enjoy your day on own.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”-2px||81px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Arial,Oswald,Georgia” custom_padding=”4px||0px|||”]

DAY 06: DEPARTURE FROM SAN JUAN

Today we check out of hotel and transfer to airport for flight back home or your next destination.

HAVE SAFE TRIP!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”More Places” _builder_version=”3.0.76″ min_height=”873px” custom_margin=”-412px||142px|||” custom_padding=”0||50px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” global_module=”117″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_blurb url=”http://www.facebook.com/pages/Discover-Destinations/156630901051625″ use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%291%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ _builder_version=”3.15″]
